body_html:
Seems to be a reasonable patch.

By the way, how do you measure the rates? The MT27620 ConnectX-4 NIC should support 100 GbE fabrics. These rates seem a little bit too small compared to the hardware capabilities.
body_text:

body:
Seems to be a reasonable patch. 

By the way, how do you measure the rates? The MT27620 ConnectX-4 NIC should support 100 GbE fabrics. These rates seem a little bit too small compared to the hardware capabilities.
